alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 03 at 6:25PM CST until January 04 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN LEAKE AND NORTHERN NESHOBA COUNTIES... At 625 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Madden, or 7 miles southeast of Carthage, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Madden around 630 PM CST. Edinburg around 640 PM CST. Philadelphia and Pearl River around 645 PM CST. Burnside around 655 PM CST. Stallo around 700 PM CST. Nanih Waiya around 710 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Standing Pine. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
